name: Find Friends
description:
Game for 2019 Spring UE4Jam.

Theme: "The Other Side Of The Coin"

You have to find friends in the map. But when you find friend some part of the ground is destroying.

Movement:

  • WSAD: Move
  • R: Break menu
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse: LookUp

TeamName: Fankazen

TeamMember: Florian Fontaine

List any content that was created before the jam: None

List any content of MarketPlace assets: POLYGON: City-Pack
